materials: Glue & Adhesives; Antifreeze; Brake Fluid; Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Compact Fluorescent Lights; Degreasers; Fertilizer; Fluorescent Lamps/Tubes; Herbicides; Household Cleaners; Insecticides; Ni-Cd Batteries; Other Batteries; Paint Donation; Latex Paint; Paint Thinner; Photography Chemicals; Pool Chemicals; Batteries (Rechargeable); Solvents; Used Motor Oil; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
This site keeps seasonal hours and closes on Mondays in the winter season.  Please contact the site for current hours of operation.
Commercial and government generators of moderate risk hazardous waste should please call for information regarding a reduced rate for disposal options.
Please do not mix products and keep the labels with the containers.  Please attach loose labels with a rubber band or other fastener.
